remarks: The dual vector space of functionals with closed kernels is a left vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lcdlmod.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcdlmod.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdlmod.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcdlvec $p |- ( ph -> C e. LVec ) $.
